description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=1/3, Mature Content=2/3. Call of the Underworld is a top-down shooter in the vein of Japanese bullet hell games. Pick one of four teams and make your way through over 100 densely packed bullet patterns. Aim for the highest score, or simply try to survive through all 10 stages.  A practice mode is available, and replays of your played games can be saved and watched again later.
